body: We petition the Obama administration to declare that all flags be flown at half mast on all govt. buildings for a period of 1 week in Honor of U.S. Navy Seal Chris Kyle.  Chris was a hero both on and off the field of battle.  He served and loved this country loyally.  He also served other wounded warriors loyally when he returned to the states.  He had a servants heart and has done more for the propagation of constitutional liberty in this country then any body currently serving ANY political party.  We would also like to see President Obama man up and attend Mr. Kyles funeral.
title: declare that American flags be flown at half mast for one week in honor of Navy Seal Chris Kyle
